description:
Isologic Innovative Radiopharmaceuticals, the industry leader in preparation and delivery of nuclear medicines, has an immediate position available as a full time courier driver.
As a Customer Delivery Associate (delivery driver), you will support pharmacy operations by handling, packaging and delivering radiopharmaceuticals.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES/ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS

 Delivery of pharmaceuticals and medical tests using company vehicles (uniform provided)
 Assist with tasks required in the laboratory
 Full-time position
 Short and long distance runs available

REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS

 Valid G driver’s license and clean abstract
 Ability to work shifts that have staggered start times beginning as early as 4am through 8am
 Ability to accommodate shift changes based on business needs
 Ability to lift 50 pounds

Previous delivery driving experience and/or handling and transporting pharmaceuticals or radioactive materials would be an asset. All training will be provided and paid for by Isologic Innovative Radiopharmaceuticals.
If you are interested in this position, please send you CV as quickly as possible ou please call Georgina Avila, Facility Manager, at 613-761-5370.
We are an equal opportunity employer. Only those selected for an interview will be contacted.
#CDA
Job Types: Permanent, Full-time
Salary: $20.00 per hour
Benefits:

 Dental care
 Disability insurance
 Employee assistance program
 Extended health care
 Life insurance
 On-site parking
 RRSP match
 Vision care

Schedule:

 8 hour shift

Supplemental pay types:

 Overtime pay

COVID-19 considerations:Health and safety of our employees is a priority and measures to track employee symptoms and wearing masks and social distancing in the lab as well as in the common areas are being followed to reduce the risk of contracting the virus.
Work Location: On the road
